name: Corrupted Station
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project.

Modifications:

  1. Added several custom environmental sprites (some animated) to make the levels look better.
  2. Added three more levels (A total of 5). Difficulty will increase each level.
  3. Gave the player the ability to phase through platform objects by jumping from below.
  4. Implemented a final boss (using custom art and code)

Credits:
Created by Michael Burkett
